person.persName: Peyton A. Spears (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Ann Davison Spears on May 21, 1849. Father of Helen Spears, Ruth Ann Spears, Mildred Spears, Nancy J. Spears, Robert S. Spears, and Anbrose P. Spears. Farmer in Anderson County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 248; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 102; Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Anderson County, Kentucky, May 21, 1849; KYR-0001-029-0565.
